Articles.Content: Daww, I was hoping for something more dynamic, like a silly "simulator" with a chicken you could interact with.
lol ... great. I know just the crew I'm sending that link to.
That may be the most useless website I've ever seen.....

> 
> That may be the most useless website I've ever seen.....

[Try this one, then.](http://hasthelargehadroncolliderdestroyedtheworldyet.com/)
Almost all young people don't get this [http://42.com](http://42.com)

> Almost all young people don't get this [http://42.com](http://42.com)

I get it!

this should become the "useless websites thread"
